text: aur (ai rasool) jab hamaaree vaazee va raushan aayaten unake saamane padh kar sunaee jaatee hain to tum (un) kaaphiron ke cheharon par naakhushee ke (aasaar) dekhate ho (yahaan tak ki) qareeb hota hai ki jo log unako hamaaree aayaaten padhakar sunaate hain un par ye log hamala kar baithe (ai rasool) tum kah do (ki) to kya main tumhen isase bhee kaheen badatar cheez bata doon (achchha) to sun lo vah jahannum hai jisamen jhonkane ka vaayada khuda ne kaafiron se kiya hai
